en-US.title: Columbia Fertility Associates - a comprehensive fertility clinic
en-US.description: Columbia Fertility Associates provides inclusive and tailored fertility treatments to the transgender community. The clinic's services include male infertility, artificial insemination, ovary rejuvenation, egg freezing, genetic testing, surrogacy and in-vitro fertilization among others. CFA also offers assistance with insurance coverage and potential financing options to ensure access for all members of the LGBTQ community in their path to parenthood.

address: 2440 M St NW #401, Washington, DC 20037, USA
